summary: This bitingly funny comedy follows a prickly, profanity-prone man seeking to preserve his dream; it dishes up bites of wisdom along the way, ultimately serving both a hilarious trip and a charming slice of New York history.
cast: Michael Fishman|John A. Papa|Eve Shopsin|Kenny Shopsin|Calvin Trillin
keywords: eatery|claim in title|manhattan new york city|greenwich village manhattan new york city|restaurant
title: I Like Killing Flies
